2054.subject: HCOM
2054.descrlong: A graduate-level course primarily designed for students in the Critical Multicultural Education Master's Program. Explores emerging intellectual paradigms in the Chicano community and traces their antecedents and relationships. Provides an intensive foundation in Chicano studies theory and emergent issues. Offers built-in assessment in HCOM MLO 5 or the concentrations in Chicana/o-Latina/o Studies or Comparative American Studies. (Offered occasionally.)
